item.title: Way to cheat in school's exam
item.dc:creator: @Attiusca Attiusca
item.description:
@Attiusca wrote:

Usually our chemistry teacher allows us to use a blank sheet of paper from our notebooks for scrap paper/working out formulas. I just writes notes on the paper and take it out.

If you sit next to a friend, switch tests when the teacher is not looking, look at some of the answers you didn’t get, and switch back.

Write notes on the desk the day before the test, very risky if the teacher notices there is writing on your desk, but the safest way to cheat.

Put a textbook in the bathroom before you go to class, then during the test ask if you can use the restroom, then take your time looking up answers.

Or this worked for me a lot of times, review the answers the night before and fill them in when you get the test.

Read full topic
item.source: Way to cheat in school's exam

item.title: Way to cheat in school's exam
item.dc:creator: @Squigglyo Squigglyo
item.description:
@Squigglyo wrote:

my universaty test
i could have past it, it was easy enough i just like cheating.

Wrote the notes down on small pieces of paper, and then attached them to the inside of my jacket making them look like cleaning tags.

Also, another test i wrote down the answers, rolled the paper up so i could still see the writing, and put it inside my see thru pen.

Read full topic

use scrape paper place 2 papers together and write on the first paper which will leave scar on the second paper take the scared paper to test or exam and simply shade it and the scars will show up whatever u wrote on the paper… it work!..mt friends use it and they told me and their results r awesome.

item.title: Way to cheat in school's exam
item.dc:creator: @qauters qauters
item.description:
@qauters wrote:

Cheating on exams is fail. If they catch you, you’ll be kicked from school. (At least at us).
Cheating at normal tests is easy as hell. Write everything you need on word, print it out on size 3. Cut it into a small paper.
Once on school, sit in the back in front of the teacher (with students in front of you). Then take your paper put it behind your arm (the one you don’t write with) and cheat :). Once finished drop it into your schoolbag or whatever.

I do that every time, never got detected lol

Read full topic
item.source: Way to cheat in school's exam
